Review Text: After a couple of hours of driving in a bumpy path, I reached the first tracking route We followed the white point for half an hour until I reached the edge of the abyss It was a great feeling

The Pitamaruwa Mini Worlds End is located at the end of the lush tea Plantation Roeberry Estate.When you reach the top of the hill it is possible to see, other ranges of rocks such as Dehigala and Doraboda covered in with the thin forests.Traveling distance is around 200 Km from Colombo . View from this place is awesome & beautiful.Initially we thought stop to go there and return back.But after reach there,we are really satisfied . Beautiful place ,you should go.but please don,t pollute the area.As well very dangerous place.Don't go very near.
